cause.description:
Its a group for people, like me, who hate contemporary art. Its also the start of a revolution against progressiveness...in the art world. I suggest we move back to impressionism, or even further, back to the detailed renaissance type portraits of kings and queens. But seeing as we dont have a monarchy in America. This group also doubles as a beginning movement towards a monarchy in America!
Down with the establishment, up with...royalty.
1. contemporary art gets confusing sometimes, is it just a chair, or is there some symbolic meaning behind it...hmmm...fuck that, wheres a portrait painting.
2. It hurts to look at sometimes.
3. Its confusing?
cause.mission: Its a group for people, like me, who hate contemporary art.
cause.name: P.A.P.O.C.A. (People Against the Progression Of Contemporary Art)
